name: trio-ai
description: Trio AI - Agricultural Yield Prediction Platform

scripts.dev: concurrently -n FE,BE -c blue,green "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:backend"
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.clean: rm -rf frontend/.next frontend/node_modules backend/dist backend/node_modules node_modules
